page.title: HP ProCurve Wireless Access Point 530 NA (J8986A)

revision.text:

|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4S641632H-TC60; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR5312A;AR5312A-001, A21592.02B, 0523, TAIWAN; |rad2chip2 = Atheros;AR2112A;AR2112A-0<..>, CR0935.00<..>, 0528, KOREA; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :Product: HP '''J8986A''' (na) / '''J8987A''' (ww) :Regulatory Model: '''RSVLC-0501'''
"P/N: 142662820000E REV. 0C" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Default settings (including the SSIDs) are per the FCC manual.
*{{WPLink|ProCurve_Products#Wireless_access_points}}
===Specifications=== *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/hp-j8986a-procurve-access-point-530-1663 ''HP ProCurve Access Point 530 NA (J8986A)'' on '''SpeedGuide'''] :Chipset: PowerPC MPC8248 @400MHz :RAM: 32MB, Flash Memory: 16MB *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/hp-j8987a-procurve-access-point-530-ww-1664 ''HP ProCurve Access Point 530 WW (J8987A)'' on '''SpeedGuide'''] :Chipset: PowerPC MPC8248 @400MHz :RAM: 32MB, Flash Memory: 16MB *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/hp-j9385b-e-m110-access-point-us-1665 ''HP ProCurve Access Point M110 US (J9385B)'' on '''SpeedGuide'''] <!-- :[[HP ProCurve Access Point M110 US (J9385B)]] [https://www.speedguide.net/routers/hp-j9385b-e-m110-access-point-us-1665 E-M110 US] :[[HP ProCurve Access Point M110 WW (J9388B)]] [https://www.speedguide.net/routers/hp-j9388b-e-m110-access-point-ww-1666 E-M110 WW] :[[HP ProCurve MultiService Access Point MSM310 (J9374B)]] [https://www.speedguide.net/routers/hp-j9374b-hp-e-msm310-access-point-1639 E-MSM310] :[[HP ProCurve MultiService Access Point MSM310-R (J9380B)]] [https://www.speedguide.net/routers/hp-j9380b-procurve-e-msm310-r-access-point-1661 E-MSM310-R] -->
